lender.name: Dave and Maralee
lender.loan_because: What a wonderful idea! How could we not be part of this?
lender.occupational_info: golf, travel, golf !

lender.name: Family of Five
lender.loan_because: I want to give back for all the good that has come in my life. I also want to set a good example for my three children and expose them to generosity at a young age.
lender.occupational_info: I stay home with three very active children under the age of five!

lender.name: Adriane
lender.loan_because: I believe that we all need help at some point in our lives. It makes me feel that I can make a difference in this world. I want to teach my children that no matter how little you have there is always room to help someone else out.
lender.occupational_info: I volunteer with organizations I believe in and raise our children

lender.name: Kathy
lender.occupation: Former HealthCare Manager and now Stay at Home Mom

lender.name: Lauren
lender.loan_because: I believe in giving...
lender.occupational_info: I close loans and perform real estate transactions...

lender.name: Brenda
lender.loan_because: I am blessed with all that I have(although not very much). I feel it is my duty to share it with those less fortunate. It is a wonderful feeling to know that my small donation has made such an impact in someone's life.
lender.occupational_info: The work is both rewarding and very challenging.

lender.name: Linh
lender.loan_because: the opportunity was presented to me and I am grateful for the gift.

lender.name: Nicole & Hiren
lender.loan_because: We're blessed to be able to help others.
lender.occupational_info:
Hiren helps make investment decisions for a pension fund. Nicole writes, teaches English to speakers of other languages, and designs jewelry.
Join Kiva lenders from around the world at www.KivaFriends.org

lender.name: Diana
lender.loan_because: I believe it's the right thing to do - to give a hand up, not a handout!
lender.occupational_info: I make it easier for someone to buy and sell homes.

lender.name: AMY AND LYLE
lender.loan_because: We are Christians and care about what happens to the families and children who need help. If we can't offer a mere $25 to help someone feed their family, then it is a pathetic representation of me and my family.
lender.occupational_info: I help manage the day to day operation of three medical clinics. We work with 7 doctors and 2 nurse practitioners, along with about 25 staff members. It is a very rewarding and fulfilling carrier.

lender.name: Rigo
lender.loan_because: A dollar goes a long way.

lender.name: Beverly
lender.loan_because: I like helping others.
lender.occupational_info: I am a wellness coach. I teach others how to maintain a healthy body.

lender.name: Travis (Jose Alberto)
lender.loan_because: I was adopted from Comayagua Honduras in 1991, and would like to give someone else a chance.
lender.occupational_info: I go to school.

lender.name: Corinne
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do. It's a privilege to empower others and loaning gives me another opportunity to assist.

lender.name: Jamael
lender.loan_because: This is a great and easy way to give back. Lending money allows you to leverage your charitible intentions, without actually extending charity!
lender.occupational_info: I help to invest money for my company.

lender.name: Mary & Michael
lender.loan_because: It just seems like such a unique opportunity. Who can say they help someone in a third world country make their life better. It feels great.

lender.name: Eileen
lender.loan_because: This is a great innovative way to give back to those in need. I like that 100% of my money will be given to the recepient then repaid to help another person. What an awesome program!
lender.occupational_info: I am a retired insurance specialist.

lender.name: Pete & Carol
lender.loan_because: We feel that we are doing our part to help others. . .
lender.occupational_info: I (Pete) am semi-retired and work PT as a Hospitality Consultant in Private Clubs, Hotels/Resorts, & Senior Retirement Communities. My 'better half' (Carol), is a retired elementary school teacher (after 25 years. . .).

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I am fortunate to be in a position where I can give to those who may need assistance in fulfilling their dreams.
lender.occupational_info: I am a trial lawyer in Los Angeles. I am blessed with doing what I love, but more importantly, with a beautiful family.

lender.name: Diana House
lender.loan_because: As a self-employed businesswoman, I have gone through the lean years and am now beginning to enjoy some financial serenity. While I continually ask myself, how can I give back, I am reluctant to put hard-earned dollars into a "vat" that has little accountability to the end use of my contribution. I was completely intrigued with this concept and will double up and re-invest on payoffs of loans. This clearly appeals to my sense of being an entrepreneur.
lender.occupational_info: I am a professional consultant to legal professionals (lawyers, expert witnesses, bailbonds companies, private investigators) in placement and growth of their Internet marketing dollars. I'm proud to be in Sales! In the end, we all are!!!

lender.name: Thomasena
lender.loan_because: I loan because I truly feel that God has blessed me and my family in so many ways. To be blessed is to be able to give.
lender.occupational_info: I do a lot of paperwork in my job.

lender.name: Melissa & Eric
lender.loan_because: It's time to give back.

lender.name: Sharon
lender.loan_because: it's helping communities to grow.

lender.name: Cile
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: Business to business advertising sales

lender.name: Jim
lender.loan_because: I like the fact that even the little bit I can do helps make a real difference.

lender.name: Ruzbeh
lender.loan_because: I want to help people in 3rd world countries who need the money. I think everybody should help each other, after all we are all cohabitants of the same planet.
lender.occupational_info: I am a computer consultant/e-business specialist.

lender.name: Jenni
lender.loan_because: I can't think of a reason not to.

lender.name: JOANNA
lender.loan_because: I want to help. I want to feel a connection. We do what we can in life and Kiva helps us do a little more. Throwing a pebble into the ocean - begins with a ripple and then eventually becomes a wave of change.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a story teller. I work in TV primarily. But I would love to make a film one day. One of my favourite all time movies is "Cinema Paradiso" about an Italian director who reflects back on his childhood after he learns of the death of his beloved friend back in his hometown that he left years before. I love this movie because among many things - it's about family and community and never forgetting where you come from - even if you are miles and years away. Movies help us to connect - on a personal level and at the same time on a universal scale. I think Kiva does the same thing so beautifully. I'm glad to be a small part of this terrific organization.

lender.name: Carol
lender.loan_because: it feels good to help others less fortunate
lender.occupational_info: I dye, paint, cut, stitch fabric to make art for the walls

lender.name: The Heron-Clark Family
lender.loan_because: We believe in the promise of empowerment. The fact that so much can change with such little monetary input is a humbling thought. We can all change lives, we just need to take the initiative and make it happen.

lender.name: Shannon
lender.loan_because: It is so rewarding and I think makes as much of an impact on the world community as many other much larger projects.
lender.occupational_info: I manage large website projects for various US Government agencies. These websites either help connect job seekers and employers with job opportunities in the government or connect military veterans and their spouses with employment opportunities.

lender.name: Elizabeth
lender.loan_because: any step I'm able to take that helps make this world better for everything living on it, is what I want to do.
lender.occupational_info: Since my parents died last year, I felt compelled to retire and live simply so that I could be of service to others. I volunteer when I can and do what I'm able to do. I donate as well but not as much as I volunteer. One day I might go back to work but until then I'll just keep on looking for ways to help.

lender.name: Charm
lender.loan_because: My adopted mom was a school teacher and entrepreneur. During her life she was into real estate, a poultry owner, a bakery owner, and even had a fishing boat business.
lender.occupational_info: I have been a nurse for 6 years.

lender.name: Patrick
lender.loan_because: Well, golly gee, someone better do it.

lender.name: HERLTC
lender.loan_because: We are all humans living on this earth. The earth's resources belong to all of us equally.
lender.occupational_info: Doing what I enjoy doing.

lender.name: Stephanie
lender.loan_because: I lend money because I can and because I think that everyone who wants to control their destiny and shape their future should never be held back by lack of money.

lender.name: David Jay
lender.loan_because: I've realized that it's impossible to do anything great alone - we all need the help of others and this is one way I can pass along what people have given to me.
lender.occupational_info: I help photographers create freedom in their lives by sharing technology and knowledge.

lender.name: Leonard
lender.loan_because: At this point in my life I am able. I am paying back.

lender.name: Carolyn
lender.loan_because: My cup runneth over. It is a privilege to share what I have been given.

lender.name: juliette
lender.loan_because:
we live in a global village. i help people all the time and enjoy doing it.
and i am curious to see how the clothing bussiness i made a loan to does.
i wish the owners much success.
lender.occupational_info:
i keep my house, grocery shop, take care of my 2 dogs.
i do volunteer work w/ 2 rescue dog organizations.
i sew for pleasure and i use my computer to talk about many subjets w/ people all around the world.
i also do interfaith work w/ women of all differnt faiths.
and i am a passionate political activist.!!

lender.name: Walid
lender.loan_because: i am a human being and when another person needs help, i try to help. i loan because in this case i can help people help themselves and i know my money will be handled in the best way.
lender.occupational_info: i film music videos and documentaries.

lender.name: Wendy
lender.loan_because: We have been blessed with a home, a healthy family, and food on the table. So, we will try to share those blessings with others!

lender.name: George & Ruby
lender.loan_because: It's a wonderful idea.

lender.name: Michael
lender.occupational_info: I help companies install and use large software systems.

lender.name: Erica
lender.loan_because: It's amazing to help people.
lender.occupational_info: I oversee retail stores that sell time management training and tools.

lender.name: Christy
lender.loan_because: As Winston Churchill once said...We make a living by what we get, but we make a life by what we give.

lender.name: Cambridge Rietemas
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance.
lender.occupational_info: I am a law student and my wife is a high school special education teacher.

lender.name: Laura
lender.loan_because: joy comes from uplifting and empowering people.
lender.occupational_info: I am the editor of Daily Word magazine, published by Unity http://www.dailyword.com

lender.name: I-Team
lender.loan_because: It's a clever way of helping others; and since it's a loan and not a gift, the same monies can then be used to help additional families.
lender.occupational_info: Real Estate Investment and Development

lender.name: Dana
lender.loan_because: I have so much and these women struggle to take care of their families.

lender.name: Maya
lender.loan_because: people's dreams need to be funded.
lender.occupational_info: I talk to people about movies and get paid for it.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a travel agent.

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: I am very grateful for what I have and want to share with others. I've had many advantages living in the US.
lender.occupational_info: Former administrative assistant now retired.

lender.name: Hayley
lender.loan_because: I am trying to teach my kids about the world around them and to open their hearts.

lender.name: Rylee Michael
lender.loan_because: I want to help other people.
lender.occupational_info: I love science. My favorite way to spend my day is learning how everything works.

lender.name: Mary Ann
lender.loan_because: Honestly, I have been very fortunate in my life and have worked hard for everything I have accomplished. It just feels right to give back to those who have a dream and are willing to work for that dream.
lender.occupational_info: I manage a very busy grocery store which is primarily male dominated. I have worked up from the bottom to achieve my current position. I have been lucky to have had the opportunity to open two new grocery stores for the chain and have a great sense of pride in doing this. I never would have imagined I could have accomplished so much coming from a troubled childhood. Like Nike says "just do it".

lender.name: Larina
lender.loan_because: I heard about this program while watching Oprah, and I just immediately felt that this was a way I could help others grow their businesses. I also feel it is very important to give. I am happy that my business is successful, and I am able to help others.
lender.occupational_info: I sell properties in Squamish, located between Vancouver and Whistler, BC in Canada.

lender.name: Correatown
lender.loan_because: we all have the ability to do something good... just because. & everyone has a dream right! /// I hope to make some small difference in someone else's life because in my own life people have taken a chance on me and that made ALL the difference!
lender.occupational_info: I'm an independent musician in Los Angeles.

lender.name: Kiran
lender.loan_because: by sharing we all can prosper... There should be no place for an ugly thing like poverty in this world..

lender.name: Marsha
lender.loan_because: I am a single parent and struggled for some time. I am now in a postition where I can help someone else. I feel blessed.
lender.occupational_info: I assess medical claims with the Saskatchewan Department of Health.

lender.name: Genrong
lender.loan_because: someone needs help
lender.occupational_info: hedge fund analyst

lender.name: Diane
lender.loan_because: I'm passionate about helping the poor and as an entrepreneur, love the idea of helping other entrepreneurs pursue their dreams and secure their financial futures for themselves. I also love Ecuador and can't wait to go back to visit the business(es) I'm sponsoring.

lender.name: Michelle
lender.loan_because: I want to help make a difference in someone's life and inspire others to give.
lender.occupational_info: I have recently finished college and left my job after 13 years to spend more time with my children for a brief time...like a 'time out'. I am now looking to change careers and begin a new chapter in my life. A friend and I started a home based business which has been slow to take off. I understand the frustrations involved and know with support of others, we can all accomplish greatness!

lender.name: Connie & Steve
lender.loan_because: It's our pleasure to do so. We're grateful to share what we have with others.
lender.occupational_info: We sell children's clothing, furniture and dog supplies through the Internet to a worldwide audience. It allows us to talk to customers from far off places we'll probably never travel to and speak to people who use many different languages. It's such a joy and privilege.

lender.name: Dave & Cath
lender.loan_because: We support your work.
lender.occupational_info: We work very hard and can share.

lender.name: Barbara
lender.loan_because: I am selfish. It really makes ME feel good to give, and it is something we all should do. Sometimes $25 is hard to scrape up, but when I can scrape it up, it feels good to give it to someone worse off than myself.
lender.occupational_info: I worked at a military hospital in an administrative position. I also was a volunteer firefighter in my community. We would be the first to respond to fires, car accidents, medical calls, or even a cat up a tree! Unfortunately, I am no longer able to work due to my health. I really miss being a part of the Fire Department.

lender.name: Samantha
lender.loan_because: I have been so fortunate throughout my life. It's the least I can do.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a doctor who cares for children.

lender.name: Doni
lender.loan_because: I can't be there myself to help each person I'd like to help.
lender.occupational_info: If you need technical assistance with your Mac, or your iPhone, I can help you fix it. :)

lender.name: Anna
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed with so much during my life, I want to "give back" to others that have not been as fortunate.
lender.occupational_info: I manage a preschool of about 120 beautiful, cheerful, energy-filled preschoolers ranging from age 2 to 5.

lender.name: Darren
lender.loan_because: I should

lender.name: Debbie
lender.loan_because: I am fortunate enough to have resources to spare to help others.
lender.occupational_info: I am a manager for a teachers union working to get better pay and working conditions for all school employees.

lender.name: Mike
lender.occupational_info: I manage mainframe computers for my employer.

lender.name: Steve
lender.loan_because: It would be impossible to justify not helping.

lender.name: Tiffany
lender.loan_because: It makes the world a little better
lender.occupational_info: I help people with advanced end stage cancer by giving comfort through medicine and love.

lender.name: Innerpreneur Ventures
lender.loan_because: Making loans through Kiva fits nicely with what we're about: 'An Innerpreneur is an entrepreneur who uses their business toward personal fulfillment (creatively, spiritually, emotionally) and social change.'
lender.occupational_info: We design, build and repair Innerpreneur-oriented commercial enterprises.

lender.name: Alfonso
lender.loan_because: I believe that the only real help for developping countries is to make their people autonomous and not dependent on external ressources. Helping this people in making business, is one way of giving them the needed independance.
lender.occupational_info: I develop and maintain web services for a big telecommunication company. My areas are social networks and online collaboration tools for end customers.

lender.name: Umesh
lender.loan_because: I get make a difference in the lives of people I will probably never meet in my life. Trying to find that strain of human instinct which makes us help one another without any self interest. Recently I had a couple of repayments (the firsts since I started on Kiva) and it has brought that feeling mission accomplished. Also, it has motivated me to increase the number of les missions qui changent des vies.
lender.occupational_info:
I am working as project manager for a mid-size French consulting firm based in Paris currently working in SCM but building my strengths in becoming a brand building professional. I run a fledgling internet boutique:
We source authentic and original products from artisans in Africa and Asia (http://www.bozea.com/decoration-maison/artisans-arts-de-la-table-decoration) at good price for them and sell them on http://www.bozea.com/decoration-maison in categories of decoration, lamps, tableware, unique decorative pieces, art de la table, pices uniques and fashion accessories. Each of our artisanal products make ideal gift idea for your loved ones and yourself as well!
For my French friends...
Nous achetons des produits authentiques et originaux des artisans en Afrique et en Asie. Nous leur donner une bonne valeur pour leurs produits.
Vous pouvez dcouvrir et acheter notre slection, flnez votre guise parmi les objets de dcoration, les lampes, l'art de la table, les pices uniques ou encore notre clin d'il, la catgorie mode sur http://www.bozea.com/decoration-maison/artisans-arts-de-la-table-decoration

lender.name: Ysmay
lender.loan_because: There are many people in the world not nearly as fortunate as I am.

lender.name: Rebecca
lender.loan_because: I really want to help someone who wants to work, and just needs a little boost!

lender.name: Man
lender.loan_because: I believe in the human spirit and watching it soar is well worth any amount of money
lender.occupational_info: I'm a professional musician and artist with over 2.5 million in record sales. I know what it is like to be poor and then follow my dreams to success. Hopefully I can now help others.

lender.name: Cady
lender.loan_because: It's an easy way to help others in need.
lender.occupational_info: I teach our future generation so they can have the lives they want and deserve, and be contributing members of society.

lender.name: mary ann /Squantum ma.
lender.loan_because: I was there at one time stand tall and proud, ask for, and pay back loans ,you go girl/women/mother!!
lender.occupational_info: very hard and demanding but I love caring for others children

lender.name: Leigh
lender.loan_because: others have helped me when I needed help so badly and was unable to tackle it all by myself.
lender.occupational_info: I have the best job in the world...working with students, parents and teachers. It's awesome and very life-affirming!

lender.name: Terry
lender.loan_because: These small loans help someone else so much!

lender.name: Indira
lender.loan_because: I feel fortunate and blessed to be able to live, work and enjoy life and want to help tess fortunate.
lender.occupational_info: gratifying

lender.name: JoAnn
lender.loan_because: I believe in giving everyone the opportunity to be successful.
lender.occupational_info: I help entrepreneurs and individuals become successful by providing Success Coaching through one on one coaching and holding Success Seminars.

lender.name: dorene
lender.loan_because: I CARE.
lender.occupational_info: I HELP PEOPLE, THEY HELP ME

lender.name: Cain
lender.loan_because: I care.

lender.name: Sarah
lender.loan_because: In our hustle and bustle to "make it" in the US, we sometimes forget how lucky we are. We can change lives, we can help to close the gap. It is our responsibility as citizens of the world to look beyond our own circles and try to make a difference.

lender.name: Richard
lender.loan_because: Just the right thing to do..

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: It's a great way to help others around the world. What a great way to help promote the American Experience than to help someone achieve a business start up.
lender.occupational_info: I manage a 500 seat seafood restaurant in a busy tourist town.

lender.name: Colleen
lender.loan_because: We have to help each other to make the world a better place, each person, one person at a time.
lender.occupational_info: Retired Irish musician, concert producer and sound engineer. Currently the U.S. Compliance Manager for Austrian based international freight forwarder.

lender.name: Anthony
lender.loan_because: God has blessed me in many ways, and I believe that God blesses us in order for us to take our blessings and use them to bless others.
lender.occupational_info: I teach psychology and sociology.

lender.name: Rev. Cori
lender.loan_because: If Jesus asked me for a loan, I would give it to him and I wouldn't expect any interest. But he doesn't need one so he said, "as you did it for one of the least of these my family" you did it for me.
lender.occupational_info: I am the spiritual leader of a congregation of Episcopalians (Anglicans) in southwest Miami, Florida. I lead worship, lead Bible Studies, pray, and encourage others to follow Jesus Christ and to enjoy the gifts of life and love that God gives to us!

lender.name: Jeremy
lender.loan_because: I can either give the money to people who need it, or Starbucks, who doesn't.
lender.occupational_info: Dangerously boring.

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: I think empowered women across the world will ultimately cure many of the world's problems, especially women in the poorer countries. More power to them!
lender.occupational_info: I'm retired from my job now, but I work as a volunteer at the Bronx Zoo, part of the Wildlife Conservation Society. I try to teach our visitors something about animals and why they should be protected in the wild.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: Administering the health and functioning of computer networks.

lender.name: Christine
lender.loan_because: I have been fortunate in my life and have the ability now to assist others.
lender.occupational_info: I teach others how to use the tools they need to do their work.

lender.name: Mike
lender.occupational_info: I own an Insurance agency. We sell auto, home, commercial, life and financial products.

lender.name: Shannon
lender.loan_because: everyone deserves a chance. My mother worked so hard to give me the chance to go to college and pursue my dreams. That has allowed me to do the same for my children and anyone else who needs a helping hand. I cannot think of a better way to use my resources.

lender.name: John & Emily
lender.loan_because: This is a wonderful opportunity for us to make a small difference for good in this world.

lender.name: Marc
lender.loan_because: in my own experience, I have started with nothing but will and worked hard to make something of myself.
lender.occupational_info: I operate industrial equipment to purify dirty, contaminated water to make it safe to return it to rivers and streams.

lender.name: Cindy
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves to have a better life; if I can do something to aid in that struggle for someone else, than I know that I have truly made a difference.

lender.name: Valerie
lender.loan_because: People helping other people is what will make this world a more livable place.

lender.name: Dawn
lender.loan_because: I have had the fortune of people helping me help myself in times of need, and now its my turn to help others.

lender.name: Christie
lender.loan_because: I know that every little bit we give makes a difference.
lender.occupational_info: I monitor inbound and outboud calls to better enhance our customer's experience.

lender.name: Paul
lender.loan_because: One of the greatest ways we can help others is to help them help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I design and build software solutions for a big American company.

lender.name: Big O
lender.loan_because: I care.
lender.occupational_info: Start new businesses

lender.name: Diana
lender.loan_because: $25 dollars is such a tiny amount to give but it goes a long way to the people who are requesting the money. It can help change the world, one person or family at a time.

lender.name: courtney
lender.loan_because: its the right thing to do
lender.occupational_info: I'm a mom to 2 girls, 2 dogs, and a neighborhood full of kids

lender.name: Jeffrey
lender.loan_because: I want to help entrepreneurs around the world get their business started.
lender.occupational_info: I am a modeling and simulation engineer in the aerospace industry.

lender.name: Jude Ann
lender.loan_because: I am passionate about empowering others, I am a believer of economic and social empowerment, humanities power to reduce inequity, every life has equal value and a commitment to interconnectedness and communication can make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: Entrepreneurial Spirit just like you. If you can dream it, you can create it. Let's join together and be world conscious.

lender.name: Pepi & Harvey
lender.loan_because: We are in a position to help others with the financial assistance that they might not receive if it were not for KIVA.

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: I live in what I believe to be the best country in the world (Canada). We need to do all we can to help developing countries become self sufficient. Small business entrepreneurs are the backbone of this. If I can help out a fellow business person get ahead in life, then I feel it is my duty to do this.
lender.occupational_info: I buy and sell stamps for collectors.

lender.name: Laura
lender.loan_because: I can
lender.occupational_info: I take care of my children, and husband, and do a little computer work when I can. I cook, clean, mow the grass,

lender.name: Milly
lender.loan_because: It's an opportunity to participate in something marvelous.
lender.occupational_info: I translate texts from English into Spanish and also serve as a Spanish/English interpreter. I sometimes also record the Spanish voice in videos and recorded messages.

lender.name: The Brown Family
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do and it feels good!

lender.name: Renee
lender.loan_because: Hard working people should be given a chance to succeed!

lender.name: Dennis & Barb
lender.loan_because: This is a real no-brainer. Helping someone help themselves is essence of being human and a world citizen. This organization offers an amazing vehicle for direct person to person assistance

lender.name: Roy
lender.loan_because: I love to help people help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I give tours of the Big Island (Hawaii) to Japanese tourists. Mahalo.

lender.name: Paul Usungu
lender.loan_because: I feel I make a positive impact in someone's life.

lender.name: Nikki
lender.loan_because: We are fortunate enough to be blessed with love, family, good health, a successful business, and all the things that we need in life. We want to Pay it forward.
lender.occupational_info: We are the owners of an excavating company. We provide services including residential and commercial excavation, and sanitary sewer.

lender.name: Byron
lender.loan_because: I want to.
lender.occupational_info: I build computer graphics that allow people to control industrial machinery and process plants.

lender.name: Martha
lender.loan_because: We each have the duty to try to make the world a more humane place
lender.occupational_info: I help discover drugs to fight disease

lender.name: Morris M Kromah
lender.occupational_info: I am clinical Medical Assistant and I Coordinated clinic activities, room patients, took vitals and medical history, scheduled tests, assisted physicians with procedures, patient education, recorded information into electronic health Records, performed EKG, triaged phone calls, administered medications orally or by injection, most routes, responded to emergency situations and other department duties as assigned. Performed phlebotomy activities. Managed and maintained the laboratory. EHR super user. I worked in closed relation with a Medical Doctor as Assistant.

lender.name: Mariana and Brian
lender.loan_because: I'm greatful and feel very lucky for what I have. I feel that it's my obligation as a healthy productive person to help others that are in need.

lender.name: John and Bonnie
lender.loan_because: Love the idea of this site. We want to help.
lender.occupational_info: John is an engineer who helps to build chemical plants. Bonnie is a writer working on her first book.

lender.name: Pahl & Judie
lender.loan_because: To help others make a living just as we have been helped over the years.
lender.occupational_info: Retired photographer and aquarium employee, now volunteers at aquarium and local animal shelter. Supporters of the arts and community help organizations.

lender.name: Jon LP
lender.loan_because: I believe in making a difference.
lender.occupational_info: My parents, who work for Unicef internationally, are my biggest heros. They have shown me what a single person can accomplish.

lender.name: Jessica
lender.loan_because: I loan because I can, and because I can, I feel it is my duty to do so. I loan because I believe in the greatness and the beauty of humanity and global community.
lender.occupational_info: I help raise money to support the day to day operations of a university.

lender.name: Lowell and Pat
lender.loan_because: It is a good thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: Lowell was a petroleum refining engineer. Pat was a schoolteacher and homemaker, mother of four. We have six grandchildren in Texas and Tennessee.

lender.name: Michelle
lender.loan_because: I want to help make a difference in someone's life. At this point, I can't afford to do a lot so I am happy that I found a way to give a little, but still have an impact.
lender.occupational_info: I work for the state government to help oversee statewide child welfare programs. Part of my job is to review cases of children in foster care to ensure that the agencies working with the families are providing appropriate services.

lender.name: Brandon
lender.loan_because: I'd waste the money one something stupid
lender.occupational_info: Come next January I will be in Africa working with the kind of people I loan too.

lender.name: Richard Ray
lender.loan_because: It is right and fair. I loan through Kiva because the organization is effective and virtuous

lender.name: Clay
lender.loan_because: This is part of my personal initiative to leverage the infrastructure to make direct change to the world. This is one component of that change machine.
lender.occupational_info: I help design and change existing very large computer software systems so they work better for people's needs. Much in the same way that people change villages so that they work better for the people who live in them.

lender.name: Christopher
lender.loan_because: the world is a better place when people help eachother.
lender.occupational_info: I am in school

lender.name: Gemma
lender.loan_because: With out the help of friends, family and sometimes perfect strangers it would have been very diffucult to continue my education. I want to help that stranger continue to reach their dreams and goals.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a single mother of a beautiful 3 year old. I currently go to school to earn my degree in social service and work full time as a receptionist.

lender.name: Tom & Jen
lender.loan_because: Helping each other will hopefully bring us all together and help us realize that only together can we make this a better world.

lender.name: KANDI
lender.loan_because: I am an entreprenur, and I know how difficult it is to begin. I have a heart for those who aren't afraid to try.
lender.occupational_info: I am a public safety officer on a University campus

lender.name: Stephanie
lender.loan_because: I loan because I know first hand how difficult it is for people to get loans and realize their dreams... and how rewarding it is to see them get loans to get into their first home, dream home or even start a new business.

lender.name: Todd
lender.loan_because: I want to make a real contribution to the lives of others and communicate to others that people care about them and follow Jesus' example of serving others.

lender.name: NICOLE
lender.loan_because: I want to help people in need.
lender.occupational_info: I am a student in the 9th grade

lender.name: Donna
lender.loan_because: not only it makes me "high" but it made a difference in the borrowers' lives and their communities. Thank you Oprah for introducing this through your show.
lender.occupational_info: I am a project manager in Jupiter Capital Pte Ltd, an investment firm that thrives through niche and common sense. Bringing thoughts to actions has always been the priority. I love every lesson and mentor I've encountered and looking forward to more opportunities.

lender.name: Ana
lender.loan_because: it's the right thing to do. It's as simple as that.

lender.name: Craig
lender.loan_because: It feels good to help others live their dreams
lender.occupational_info: Creating inspiring travel experiences

lender.name: Jim
lender.loan_because: I am thankful for my blessings and wish to share with those who are working for a better life.

lender.name: jeb
lender.loan_because: There is no place for hunger in this world. I dream of a day when all will have food, clean water and shelter.
lender.occupational_info: Retired from mostly general labor. I now play internet poker for extra money. Very risky but I treat it like a business to fill my time. I make small bets in hopes of one day seeing my dreams come true. You are one of those dreams.

lender.name: 3princessesmomma
lender.loan_because: I want to see others get a chance to make a difference in their own lives.
lender.occupational_info: I write about personal finance and teach others how to make their household finances work best for them

lender.name: the Pony Wars
lender.loan_because: we would want someone to loan to us if we were in the situation many of these people are in...like if we rocked so hard we blew an amp and couldn't afford a new one. A small loan could be the difference between rocking hard and not rocking at all.
lender.occupational_info: We rock so hard...like all the time. It is hard, but enjoyable. Rocking related accidents are relatively few and far between. All in all it affords a pretty nice lifestyle if you include the day jobs.

lender.name: Danielle
lender.loan_because: I will see directly the impact of the loan. I also like the fact of helping women in need.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a utilities company (electricity provider) in the customer service department.

lender.name: Lorraine
lender.occupational_info: It's the same kind of system than in kiva. I lend some money to French people who want to create their business and who are too poor to get the trust of a bank.

lender.name: Kate
lender.loan_because: Microlending gives those who are deemed not credit worthy a chance to improve their lives.
lender.occupational_info: I am a nurse that is helping improve care to veterans

lender.name: Christopher
lender.loan_because: Kiva is so simple and effective.
lender.occupational_info: I make paintings.

lender.name: Carolyn
lender.loan_because: I want to have a direct and personal means to help other people have better lives.
lender.occupational_info: I am a sculptor who makes public art, and also a graphic designer.

lender.name: PhoenixAZHorseProperty
lender.loan_because: I can. How wonderful is that?

lender.name: stephanie
lender.loan_because: I would like to give to others that are struggling to find the means they need to improve thier future.
lender.occupational_info: I help developmentally disabled with mental illnesses deal with behavior problems that occur.

lender.name: Rosemary
lender.loan_because: I haven't yet...Waiting for Kiva to find more people with ideas and no resource. I am excited for the opportunity after seeing how families lives are changed for the good. The little interest a savings account pays is tiny opportunity cost for me.
lender.occupational_info: I manage a small office and the accounting for a foundation in the midwest.

lender.name: Billy & Cherie
lender.loan_because: We have been so fortunate in our life, and want to help others achieve their dreams.

lender.name: Christopher
lender.loan_because: Others are in just as much need as I am. The difference is that I can reach out and help make others' dreams come true.

lender.name: Kalle
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves a fighting chance.

lender.name: Betty
lender.loan_because: I am tired, bankrupt and beaten down, but at least I can do one small thing that matters to someone else.
lender.occupational_info: I work in advertising on television for different tv stations all ove the US. I help them manage their available time to sell.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: Deseo que ayudar mis hermanos en Centroamerica y Sudamerica.
lender.occupational_info: Soy un maestro de Espanol.

lender.name: Luca
lender.loan_because: universal brotherhood
lender.occupational_info: pilgrim on earth

lender.name: Filip Salomonsson
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Kara & Kevin
lender.loan_because: We are blessed with abundance in this land, the greatest joy is in sharing it with others!
lender.occupational_info: Kevin teaches high school students reading and writing, Kara studies plants, soil, and conservation science.

lender.name: Sheena
lender.loan_because: I have traveled a great deal and seen just how much a small loan can help. Investing in people, not just projects, is important.
lender.occupational_info: I work in tourism and have operated my own business

lender.name: Jordan
lender.loan_because: everyone should be given an opportunity to thrive.
lender.occupational_info: going to school for my master's in social work.

lender.name: Janna
lender.loan_because: This can help people avoid having to make the agonizing choice to leave their families behind and come here to work toward a better life and future.

lender.name: sharon
lender.loan_because:
I believe in the power of people helping people. I believe most people have it in them to do better than they are today if given a chance.
It is FUN
I believe in people!!
lender.occupational_info: I am a healthcare worker

lender.name: Linda
lender.loan_because: It's the best way to help.. giving a loan allows dignity

lender.name: Michael Hornak
lender.loan_because: ...because I'm a young entrepreneur myself, and I know it can be hard to find the help I need, even in the United States.

lender.name: June W.
lender.loan_because: i can make a difference person to person.

lender.name: Besmir
lender.loan_because: I have the opportunity to give a loan and the responsibility of having an opportunity leads me to help other's who are less fortunate.
lender.occupational_info: University Student

lender.name: deena
lender.loan_because: I value the personal connection made, in knowing the specific person being given a start in becoming self supporting.
lender.occupational_info: I have spent my life in teaching people to effect social change

lender.name: Erin
lender.loan_because: I think it's so great that I can help someone out who really needs it, even though they're so far away and I'll probably never meet them.
lender.occupational_info: I work in the front office of a preschool that is part of an organization that helps people with special needs.

lender.name: Perla
lender.loan_because: I can help someone to build a foundation for their future. It's great way to lend out a hand to people in need.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a Packing Company and we pack Cherries, Blueberries, Walnuts and then we ship them all over the world.

lender.name: Holly
lender.loan_because: I work for the federal government. This is my way of guaranteeing that US tax dollars (my paycheck) fund social causes!
lender.occupational_info: I work on computers.

lender.name: Rick
lender.loan_because: Just "Paying it forward"

lender.name: Laura
lender.loan_because: The ability of people to be in charge of their own future is so powerful.
lender.occupational_info: Left corporate job to start my own company.

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: loaning nominal sums of money to entrepreneurs throughout the world allows me to positively impact the lives of others.
lender.occupational_info: i help businesses grow and transition. I help families plan their financial futures

lender.name: Marcelle
lender.loan_because: I want to help people improve their lives and realize their dreams.
lender.occupational_info: I create art for a textile company - making signs for our retail stores, creating ads for magazines, and taking photos for our website.

lender.name: sydney
lender.loan_because: i think its a wonderful thing to be involved in. i am going to get my whole community involved, starting with my high school and then branching it out as the knowledge spreads.
lender.occupational_info: i am a freshman at CHS in texas. I love learning and will do anything to get new information. i am a pre ap and ap straight A student. Even as a freshman i am taking college classes and getting credits done.

lender.name: Maggie
lender.loan_because: everyone desires a chance.

lender.name: Katrina & Sean
lender.loan_because: The gift of giving is contagious and we want to be involved in the opprotunity to make a difference in the lives of others.
lender.occupational_info: We are thinking of starting a business of our own, but in the mean time I am working as an engineer with Sprint and in the infancy stages of applying to Law School. My husband is a truck driver and has been with internationally known UPS for 12+ years.

lender.name: Gerry
lender.loan_because: it gives me pleasure to help others, in some small way, to achieve their goals and dreams.
lender.occupational_info: I am self employed doing beautiful hand lettering (calligraphy) on special projects for others.

lender.name: Doug&Danlu
lender.loan_because: Government and large lending institutions have lost their way. Individuals and micro-loans speed funds to needy people seeking a hand up not a hand out.
lender.occupational_info: We produce video programs with subject matter for the Chinese and Asian American communities that informs, entertains and enlightens.

lender.name: Alfred
lender.loan_because: Every human being deserves the opportunity to better their lot in life. I believe people living in developing countries can do amazing work if given that opportunity.

lender.name: Donna Maria
lender.loan_because: Entrepreneurship encourages independence and self sufficiency. When a person owns something of her own, she is inspired to find even more ways to serve others. Some women have desire and the determination but no money. I want to help.
lender.occupational_info: My work and passion is helping other women be successful as business owners and home managers.

lender.name: Benjamin & Satoko
lender.loan_because: we can.
lender.occupational_info: I'm an attorney and my wife is a waitress. I assist people with their legal problems and help them protect their rights. My wife works at a restaurant and is starting college this fall.

lender.name: Carole
lender.loan_because: I have lived in Africa and Haiti for 25 years and have seen how difficult it is for the less privileged to make a living. I like to help those who help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I am a professional photographer, do freelance work and lead my own photo tours to New Mexico, France and India.

lender.name: Angela
lender.loan_because: You can give money to help feed or clothe someone for a day, but if loan someone money to start a business, they can provide for themselves and their families for a lifetime. This web site is amazing and I feel as blessed as the recipients to be a part of this!
lender.occupational_info: I help manage events to sell collectible items. Most often these items are sold to raise funds for charities.

lender.name: JBA
lender.loan_because: I want to help change the world

lender.name: Sam
lender.loan_because: I want to help however I can.
lender.occupational_info: I work with computers and the internet.

lender.name: Angela
lender.loan_because: I spend 25.00 a week in cappuccino's. If that small amount can make that big difference in someone's life, I obviously don't need coffee.
lender.occupational_info: Healing and caring for sick or handicapped individuals.

lender.name: Todd & Sarah
lender.loan_because: It is so easy to help everyone on the planet. Let's just do it !
lender.occupational_info: Test drive prototype cars.

lender.name: Linda
lender.loan_because: What impresses me most is how becoming self-sufficient can change the loan recipient's quality of life, both in terms of economic conditions but also on a personal level as well. I love KIVA!
lender.occupational_info: I am a writer. I write user manuals, process and policy documentation, training manuals, proposals; I create e-training modules (and more!) for a software company.

lender.name: Evelyn
lender.loan_because: This is a good way to help people help themselves. It's good karma to share blessings and good karma begets more good karma!
lender.occupational_info: I manage nurses and paramedics who fly in emergency helicopters to take care of critically ill and injured people.

lender.name: Joy
lender.loan_because: It is an amazing opportunity to affect people you have read about in the news and in books. I wish these families the very best in their lives.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a nonprofit organization that helps to build up children, families and neighborhoods.

lender.name: Sabir
lender.loan_because: I am proud of the ambitious, hard working individuals in the world that try to overcome the most difficult of hardships to create a better life for their loved ones.

lender.name: Jeffrey
lender.loan_because: I wanna help!!!

lender.name: Melissa
lender.loan_because: I appreciate the drive and determination that people possess to succeed. If I can help them on their journey, then I will.

lender.name: Chef Jan
lender.loan_because: I want to help others be successful and independant, as someone helped me!
lender.occupational_info: Teach professional cooking skills

lender.name: Kevin
lender.loan_because: I believe a small contribution from a worldwide family is far better than a large contribution by few. I would like to help the global market. "The earth is but one country and mankind its citizens."
lender.occupational_info: I love my work. I get to teach, and I play on computers all day.

lender.name: Susan
lender.occupation: Finance and Operations Dir for non-profit

lender.name: Janiece
lender.loan_because: I'm so thankful for the positive things in my life that I want to share a portion of the opportunity I've enjoyed with someone who needs help.
lender.occupational_info: I design telephony systems for large businesses, specializing in call center technologies.

lender.name: Kyle
lender.loan_because: Kiva has made it possible to loan one amount of money many times over, thus benefiting many different ventures by those trying to make a difference in their communities.
lender.occupational_info: I work with the United Steelworkers union, which represents workers by standing up for their rights to a good wage, safe working conditions, and guaranteed healthcare. We also work to elect politicians who stand up for our workers.

lender.name: Sheri
lender.loan_because: ....finally after all these years I am able to.
lender.occupational_info: Needed: to sustain my life as I live.

lender.name: Leslie
lender.loan_because: I am grateful for being able to help make a difference in someone's life.
lender.occupational_info: I work in the automotive industry, preparing paperwork for vehicle ownership and registration.

lender.name: Nick & Laura
lender.loan_because: it's a great idea and a good thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: we both work in healthcare research

lender.name: Vickie
lender.loan_because: I've always wanted to give back, but never found a way that worked with my lifestyle until hearing about Kiva on the Oprah show. I love the concept of Kiva and I am looking forward to being instrumental in helping someone achieve their dream.
lender.occupational_info: I configure and deploy network equipment which allows workers throughout the Pentagon to communicate inside and outside of their organizations to include internet access.

lender.name: Jonathan
lender.occupational_info: It test software to make sure that it works properly before we release it to our clients.

lender.name: Dau
lender.loan_because: My Son sent me an invitation and and now I must do my part.

lender.name: Lovans
lender.occupation: Community development and Youth Coordinator - Ghan

lender.name: Anita
lender.loan_because: Kiva provides access to helping an individual or a small group. Making small loans helps me live out the reality that small acts of love and care can change the world.
lender.occupational_info: I am a Christian minister, working in a children's hospital, providing spiritual care to patients and families.

lender.name: Joan
lender.loan_because: i was so fortunate to be born in America where anything is possible. I would like to make that possibility available to other people.

lender.name: renee
lender.loan_because: people are empowered by their own abilities to manage and provide for their families and communities.

lender.name: Maia
lender.loan_because: I have access to an extraordinary amount of resources as a Western person. That needs to be distributed fairly and I want to help do that.
lender.occupational_info: I work the land, just like most people on this planet.

lender.name: Kris & Melissa
lender.loan_because: people need help.

lender.name: IreneBee
lender.loan_because: like making a donation, if you can give/help, you should. It's human to.

lender.name: Mike & Tara
lender.loan_because: Kiva is a GREAT tool to help others help themselves.

lender.name: Ana
lender.loan_because: I read The Banker of The Poor book by Yunus and I am fascinated by idea

lender.name: Lycka
lender.loan_because: To give those the opportunitie that we take for granted.
lender.occupational_info: Bunch of happy people working within research, media, hotel, IT.

lender.name: Jim
lender.loan_because:
I want to make the world better by building transnational, grass roots connections so that people everywhere can feel that we are all working together as a species (regardless of race, religion or nationality).
I think that one way I can do my part is giving interest free loans to people who are working hard to build better lives for themselves, their families and their local communities.
lender.occupational_info: I am the General Manager of a processed fruit product importer/distributor. We buy juice concentrates, purees and essences from processors around the world. We warehouse and sell repacked, blended or as is products to food manufacturers that use the items that we carry, mostly in less than truckload quantities.

lender.name: Priscilla
lender.loan_because: It's a great way to make a difference in someone's life across the world and I believe in people! :-)

lender.name: Anja and Oren
lender.occupation: Making the world a better place.

lender.name: Shelly
lender.loan_because: I believe that we are all called to give. I love this program for the way that it provides opportunity to help others in a way that teaches responsibility and preserves dignity.

lender.name: nada
lender.loan_because: I would like to help people who can start a business or improve an existing one to better their life. I know that maybe alone I can't make a huge difference but together people contributing to the same cause can, and do make the difference needed.

lender.name: Richard Anderson
lender.occupational_info: I train engineers to be better salespeople.

lender.name: Amit
lender.loan_because: This life is short, the vanities of the world are transient, but they alone live who live for others, the rest are more dead than alive. - Swami Vivekananda.
lender.occupational_info: Maintaining and Supportiong Computer Applications.

lender.name: Ellen
lender.occupation: New Store Coordinator for retail company
lender.loan_because: I think this is a wonderful way for an individual to make a positive impact on other people's lives.
lender.occupational_info: I send information to teams of people who set up new stores around the U.S., and I help them solve problems that occur.

lender.name: Jeremy
lender.loan_because: I want to give back from all the good I have received. I want to leave the world a better place, especially for my children. Inspriations like Buddha, Mother Teresa, Gandhi, MLK, Jr.
lender.occupational_info: I work basically like an anesthesiologist. I put people asleep for surgery and keep them out of pain. I LOVE my work! Only 6 more months left until graduation! ;)

lender.name: Jon
lender.loan_because: Resources are abundant, but it's the way they are allocated that influences people's lives.
lender.occupational_info: I help businesses reduce the level of uncertainty surrounding the decisions they need to make.

lender.name: Veronica
lender.loan_because: I loan because I want the future to be bright for my son and the children of others. I believe that economic stability fosters domestic harmony and growth, which can lead to regional stability and peace.
lender.occupational_info: I prepare and review papers that allow companies to work with each other and the government.

lender.name: AT & Lizzie Light
lender.loan_because: Unfortunately, it's the only way we can help these people. For now.

lender.name: Jaime
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference in people's lives.

lender.name: Patti
lender.loan_because: A small loan makes such a large difference in the lives of the borrowers. We have so many blessings and God wants us to share them, so we are. Everyone should do this.
lender.occupational_info: I worked in International sales for many years and then I was a realtor for 9 years. After that, I retired to raise my children, teach classes, drive on field trips, etc. I am very blessed with a wonderful family and friends.

lender.name: Cliff & Erin
lender.loan_because: We want to bless others!

lender.name: Ryan
lender.loan_because: I was fortunate enough to be born in a country with unlimited opportunity, and I want to help those that do not have access to the simple things in life that we here in America take for granted.
lender.occupational_info: I raise money for companies through the debt capital markets.

lender.name: Brigitte
lender.loan_because: I am a women entrepreneur and I know how good it feels when you own your own business so I want to help another woman realize her dream company.
lender.occupational_info: I am a professional Photographer that specialized in Dog Photography. Family hires me to take portrait of their furry family member.

lender.name: Patricia
lender.loan_because: I want someone else to benefit from the windfall I received.
lender.occupational_info: I work in the frozen food department at a grocery store. When the product comes in I load it up on a cart and take to the aisle and put it away in the freezer for customers to buy. Brrrrrrr cold job!!!!!!

lender.name: Rhett
lender.loan_because: it makes good sense

lender.name: Rachel
lender.loan_because: I'm selfish. Helping others makes me happy.
lender.occupational_info: I work with the aging population as well as people who are deemed disabled and/or low-income -- advocating for them, educating them on available benefits and services and counseling them on access, hopefully alleviating some of the burdens in their lives.

lender.name: Mrs. Joanne C. R.
lender.loan_because: It's spiritually fulfilling.

lender.name: Amber
lender.loan_because: I want to help someone become successful.
lender.occupational_info: I teach art to children that wouldn't normally have the opportunity to learn about art.

lender.name: Aaron
lender.loan_because: I feel it is my duty to help those who seek to make better lives for themselves.
lender.occupational_info: It is my job to persuade members of the U.S. Congress and the Executive Branch to pass laws to promote greater use of renewable energy in the U.S.

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: Poverty is a terrible disease.
lender.occupational_info: Blood Banker

lender.name: Lorraine
lender.loan_because: The idea of helping people help themselves is a wonderful feeling and I am thrilled to be a small part of this organization!

lender.name: Nicolette Lacson
lender.loan_because: we can make a difference!

lender.name: Molly
lender.loan_because: I love to see how my loans can affect an aspiring entrepreneur on the other side of the world. The personal stories are inspiring!
lender.occupational_info: I buy advertisements on the Internet in order to increase the number of visitors to my company's websites.

lender.name: Katharine
lender.loan_because: I appreciate your efforts and think you deserve help from those who have enough to give.
lender.occupational_info: I consult with attorneys on medically-related lawsuits

lender.name: Louise
lender.loan_because: I want to share what I have
lender.occupational_info: Real Estate management and Accounting

lender.name: Eric
lender.loan_because: I have been thinking about micro-loans for years and wondered how I could get directly involved. Kiva has provided that opportunity and I'm very thankful for it. I appreciate the direct connection between people that it provides.
lender.occupational_info: I work with video, producing, editing and then creating DVDs. I also consult with companies and individuals on their media projects. I also teach video production to high school students part time.

lender.name: Amberleigh
lender.loan_because: its fun

lender.name: Abby
lender.loan_because: This is an amazing opportunity to be a part of positive change. The recipients of these loans are all people who are empowering themselves to have a better life...and their hard work and entrepreneurial spirit is truly inspiring.

lender.name: Anneke
lender.loan_because: I have been given so many opportunities to have success and I want to pass that opportunity along to someone else.

lender.name: Heather
lender.loan_because: I fell on hard times myself and was able to pull through with the help of friends and family. Maybe my small contributions will be a blessing to others in need.

lender.name: Sherrie
lender.loan_because: I like helping people and seeing people improve their lives and their community.

lender.name: Theodore
lender.loan_because: I can help others to better their lives.
lender.occupational_info: I keep the computer systems up and running for a telecommunications company.

lender.name: Brant
lender.loan_because: I was once hungry, and was given the means to feed myself.
lender.occupational_info: I help to coordinate the movement of grocery product from producers and manufacturers to the retail market throughout the north east region of the United States.

lender.name: RHONDA
lender.loan_because: every litle bit counts. What a great idea to lend to working people who just want to get their businesses off the ground. Very inspring!

lender.name: Michiko
lender.loan_because: I hope to be real help for the world.
lender.occupational_info: I help the children's drawing school. In the other time, I'm doing howsework.

lender.name: Nicky
lender.occupation: Executive Director Humane Society of Carroll Co.
lender.loan_because: I am comfortable and while certainly not rich have all that I truly need. I am very much aware of how fortunate I have been and if I can help others get on their feet I am just happy for the oportunity to be able to help. I am so grateful for the people at KIVA for their webpage.
lender.occupational_info: I am working to make the lives of animals better here in the United States. My staff and I help the homeless, unwanted and sometimes abused domestic animals in our community. We try to make sure none are being cruelly treated and we try to find homes for the ones that are homeless. I'm not sure how this will be received by those of you so much in need yourselves. I can only say that I hate to see any living creature (man or beast) suffering.

lender.name: Kathy
lender.occupation: Attorney; traveler (as often as day job allows)
lender.loan_because: these people can make more powerful use of this money in their lives than I can in mine. It feels good to share.
lender.occupational_info: I handle aviation litigation and civil appeals. I am also a recreational but obsessive travel planner, singer, beginning mosaicist, and mother to self-assured standard poodle, among other things.

lender.name: Courtney
lender.loan_because:
two words: kar. ma.
and warm fuzzies...

lender.name: ALLEN
lender.loan_because: I am able to help people less fortunate than me in 3rd World countries.
lender.occupational_info: I assist people in making the best financial decisions for their situation & goals.

lender.name: IOANNIS
lender.loan_because: I think everybody deserves a real chance in life and everybody should be able to provide for their family.This dignity is essential.
lender.occupational_info: I am a tv director and a project manager in a major tv production company in Greece.

lender.name: Stacey
lender.loan_because: I believe in people's dreams.

lender.name: Moe
lender.loan_because: I feel we were put here to help elevate each other.
lender.occupational_info: Work with computers.

lender.name: Wanda
lender.loan_because: I beleive in giving people a hand up not a hand out, and Kiva's microfinancing seems the perfect way to help someone help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I collect money from customers who have purchased our goods

lender.name: Stacey
lender.loan_because: I want to empower others to achieve their dreams. There were times when other people helped me when I needed help, so I am repaying this kindness.
lender.occupational_info: raise money for nonprofits

lender.name: Brian
lender.loan_because: this provides a unique way to assist those that are working hard to succeed.

lender.name: tabitha
lender.occupational_info: I sell cardmaking and scrapbooking supplies online.
